data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Ad Dawhah. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ad Dawhah, Qatar
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Ad Dawhah, Qatar into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Ad Dawhah, Qatar that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Ad Dawhah, Qatar that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Ad Dawhah to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 2,852 believers living in Ad Dawhah, Qatar.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ad Dawhah, Qatar a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
